Loved my stay - absolutely perfect. Friendly and sincere staff, comfortable beds, peaceful and green environment, warm showers, good location, nice co-working spots with good WiFi and perfectly clean rooms and co-spaces. 
The common area contains a nice pool and chill benches, partly in the sun where you can meet other travellers or just relax. A peaceful environment in the centre of Tulum.

Food and drinks can be a bit expensive, but the quality and comfort is worth it. At some days there might be loud music on the rooftop in the evenings (not at night), but if you just go up and enjoy the party it's way less disturbing.
Beautiful roams and decor. All staff was great. The food was phenomenal. Great hotel.

The bathroom was dark. I had a very hard time putting on makeup. It needs better lighting.
I liked the music, but a couple nights the music on rooftop was so loud it was hard to sleep.
Everything, the place, the vibe was perfect.
the bed was really great, the shower too

there is a party at the Nana bar 3 times a week with really loud music, making it unable to sleep before 0100. as it’s not listed as a party hotel this was not a pleasant thing to find out. also the rooms have glass sliding doors so noise gets in very easy.
Great place, feels like you are in the jingle far away from the city while actually it is just 10 min walk to the center. Very comfortable room and beds. Rooftop bar
Good bar. Clean rooms Very accommodating staff.
Bar closed too soon for residents.

Excellent layout. New hotel with a really nice concept. The staff was amazing. They have good Djs certain days of the week at their bar Naná which has awesome service and a great sound system.
Everything was very clean.
I did not dislike anything about the property.
Comfortable, beautiful design
Quite a lot dof noise from the surroundings when trying to sleep in
Very clean room, very cozy beds, very well equipped bathroom, amazing shower. Good location, very nice garden, gives very private and cozy vibes. Also many options for breakfast, very tasty.
the design is awesome
the room was small for the value/price
the lovely staff. The teammembers are amazing, so sweet, lovely and eager to help you with everything.
nothing to say here

The Beautiful and intricate design of the hotel was amazing. It is nice that there is a small swimming pool. The view from the rooftop is amazing and it has a very beautiful bar. Very clean, and the location is central and feels safe. Very close to a nice yoga school.

The menu was healthy, but details can be improved in the dishes. (for instance getting more fruit and honey with pancakes, more toppings on egg sandwishes etc.) The menu was a bit overprized compared to the quality. 
The parties were too loud. If you dont like to party its a bit of a bummer that you can't go to bed early. Be informed!
Close to centre and quiet neighbourhood
Access path to the property from the street is precarious
the bed was gorgeous, extremely comfortable. everything was lovely and clean, lovely soaps and hand creams left for us
a little bit noisy. to be expected with the rooftop bar but one night there were people making outside our room til the early hours of the morning

The morning receptionist Ana, was so accommodating. we arrived before check in time and she hold out luggage there at the property till it was time. Any questions we had she help us with. Also, their food and drinks are great. The room was clean and decoration was great especially for a girl group.
The only thing we didn’t appreciate were some of the guest, but I know it out of the properties’ hands.

Great hotel, the decoration is amazing, very beautiful 
Th entrance of the hotel and overall commun spaces are very confortable 
The room is very spacious, the bed is big 
The breakfast is amazing (not included though)
Staff is super friendly.
Great location very close to all the parties from Tulum, also from the beaches. 
Yes the hotel is festive with a bit of noise, but you are in Tulum to party, ain’t you? The noise was not disturbing at all for us.
Nothing
One of the best hostels I stayed at.
Very nice building, decoration.
Techno parties 2 evnings in a raw.
Comfortable big bed. Really beautiful room with nice big bathroom. Shower was really good. Room was very clean. Party at the rooftop was nice!

Booking said the hotel had free bikes for costumers. But when we asked for them the women said they weren't available because they were fully booked. When we asked longer she told us they had only one bike.. so stating on booking that there are free bikes is actually not true. 
The hotel is very beautiful and 'instagrammable', but mainly made for looks instead of service and comfort.
The deco, the people in general - really helpful staff. The rooftop parties. Great 6 person dorms with enough space.
The staff were amazing! Louis and Ana were so kind, considerate and caring. Absolutely lovely and made our stay very very welcoming!
the hotel is very cute and the staffs are amazing

We booked the Maka Hotel at the last minute due to reading bad reviews for an airbnb we had booked months prior. We were a bit skeptical at first because the price was low and it said it was a hostel too.
 The Maka Hotel far exceeded our expectations and we were so glad we made the switch. 
The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The breakfast bar by the pool stays open until about 3pm and serves a really good avocado smoothie that I highly recommend. 
The pool is clean but very cold. Perfect for a quick dip. 
The rooftop bar is nice and plays good music.  People from neighboring hotels also stop by so it's a good place to meet people as well.  
Our room was on the 3rd floor and the music from the rooftop bar was not a problem. Our room was spacious and clean.  The bed was very comfortable. The air conditioning in the room was great. 
The grounds are clean and well kept. Lots of places to eat within walking distance. 
The only downside I can think of is there is no elevator so if you are staying on any level other than the ground level you will have to carry your luggage up the stairs. The staff was very quick to help us with ours.  
Overall, great place to stay! We will definitely be back.
Great staff, comfortable and private beds. Loved the pool and lounge area
The wifi was a bit spotty sometimes and the rooftop drinks were expensive, these were really the only down sides for me.
Great staff (including the doggos!). The beds were really comfortable and had good privacy. Really enjoyed the pool and lounge area.
The wifi was a bit spotty sometimes and the rooftop drinks were expensive, these were really the only down sides for me.

By far the best place I stayed in in Mexico. Great comfortable bed with a lot of privacy. Great location, nice and friendly staff, I kept extending my stay. 
Didn't have any issue with the partying as it was over by 1 p.m
This hotel was in a great location and the staff were wonderful! The design of the hotel is great as well.

The roooms were damp and you can see the water damage on the walls and I could feel this on my clothes that were touching the wall. They have parties every sunday, Wednesday and Friday. The music is so loud that our bed was shaking and we werent on the floor below the music. The music goes until 2am. Even on the nights that were not party nights the music does get progressively louder. I think the problem is, the doors arent very solid and do not close properly so do almost nothing to stop sound from passing.
beds were awesome
loud music but not till to late. don’t expect a silent hotel though.
Great staff there was a man and woman in particular but all of the staff are beyond friendly and happy to help with everything, great facilities and lovely mix of people aswell

The pool was gorgeous and all the plants and wood structures really give a fresh and tropical ambient. Beds were very comfortable and in general the ambient was super chill and relaxing. I would come back to stay there again.
Food at the hotel was very expensive compared to other places, which kept us from enjoying some snacks by the poolside
I liked everything, especially the staff. They were always very helpful!
Breakfast variety and quality are awsome.
Music until 11pm at the bar can be heard in entire hotel

Modern with not too many rooms, so it felt like a proper boutique hotel!
Staff is responsive via whatsapp and easy to arrange things with them.
It’s not a 5 star accommodation (no proper doors to close the room) or service (not all members of staff speak english, room was not cleaned the second day)

If you want the luxury of having everything done hand and foot for you this is not that property. If you want a property that treats you like family this is it! 
We mentioned that we are celebrating our 30th birthday and they made up the room for us with little surprises. 
When the bus driver left us stranded and we needed to get to the airport they dropped what they were doing and got us a taxi. 
I cannot stress how wonderful the staff is. 
The rooms are very cute. For some they may be basic but given the natural humidity that is best. Beautifully done and beautiful courtyard. Its an influences heaven.

These are out of the hotels hands but I wanted to let future guests know so that they are ready. 
-the power went out, while it was annoying  the outlets and ac still worked. That was a saver. 
-animals are loud at night
- there is a club on the roof but its not annoying loud.
great eco friendly property, the staff is amazing, Anna and Chris  looked after us every day giving us the special touch of feeling as at home.
all was great
The property was great set up in the center of Pueblo Tulum and a 15 minute drive to the beach areas of Tulum. Air condition worked great.

The pool is not really usable considering no sun hits that area at all, there is no sun chairs or anything to lay on after the fact. There is no breakfast on the property and hard to find someone when you want a coffee or tea. Or even an appetizer when you don’t want to leave the property. We stayed for a week so there was a day in there we wanted to just relax and it was tough with no food on the property. Also Berta, the dog.. if you are not a dog person and or allergic, this may bother you. I know our friend is NOT a dog person and Berta is a little intimidating. Overall it was an ok experience

Chill pool area
Nice rooftop bar
Nice bathrooms and showers
Big room

A bit noisy at times from parties at neighboring hostels/hotels
New water each day in the room would have been nice
i love that they decorated my room for my bday. i felt amazing..
the pool was close.

absolutely beautiful location and hotel, food was amazing and best of all the service and staff were the best part. They were very welcoming and helpful, helping us make the most of our trip in tulum. the location was great being close to everything, the decor of the hotel was beautiful and very picturesque. the food was better than most of the expensive/higher end restaurants in tulum, make sure you try the breakfast and poke bowl it’s the best you’ll ever taste! overall a great experience and would definitely recommend.

The layout of our room was a little uncomfortable to get up and down from the steep stairs, would suggest a more comfortable/secure staircase to get up to the second story of the room. other than that it was absolutely amazing! very zen, beautiful and clean.
Very lovely staff, very tranquille and great facilities. free filtered water, excellent bed and lovely pool.

property was lovely but just be aware there is currently some building works being carried out at the hotel so lots of banging in the mornings. apart from that it is wonderful - maybe enquire before you stay to see if they are still going on.

È una struttura magnifica, super pulita, il cuoco Roger è un cuoco d’eccezione, i suoi piatti sono strabuoni e gustosi, Pablo (cameriere e manager della struttura) è simpaticissimo e molto alla mano. non potete perdervi questo posto assolutamente!!!
purtroppo non c’è l’aria condizionata, ma il ventilatore è super funzionale per la notte e si sta bene comunque.

Le cadre est absolument incroyable et le personnel aux petits soins. Nous avons été touchés par l'accueil qui nous a été réservé et la gentillesse de toute l'équipe. On se sent dorloté, tout est fait pour oublier l'extérieur, un refuge parfait pour une parenthèse reposante et déconnectée.
Endroit au top si on cherche le calme. Personnel au petits soins. Hyper propre . On est isolé donc on mange là le soir mais cuisine très bonne
Pas d airco ni de grand ventilateur au plafond dans la chambre. Juste un petit ventilateur d appoint qui est insuffisant. On a eu chaud !

Nuestra experiencia en este lugar fue maravillosa. Muy limpio, organizado, atentos, siempre al pendiente de todo, comodidad (tengan en cuenta no ahí AC pero aún así regresaría a este maravilloso lugar, y ni hablar de la comida( tacos arrechera, pasta Alfredo, guacamole con chips , arrechera al grill, torta de chocolate).  Quiero  destacar el personal: Hector súper pendiente de nuestra llegada muy atento. Pablo con el servicio del bar excelente estaba pendiente de todas nuestras necesidades y Rogelio fue absolutamente espectacular es un chef que cocina con amor.
así que mi resume es un lugar precioso, con gente maravillosa y una comida excepcional nada que envidiar a los grandes restaurantes aunq podría decir que si ahí algo y es el amor que pone Rogelio en todo lo que hace 
nuestro deseo es un pronto regrese, realmente fue un tiempo de descanso increíble superó todas nuestras expectativas. 
gracias Hector, Pablo y Rogelio
no tengo nada que decir todo fue excelente

Desde la llegada se siente la tranquilidad, por la zona, por las instalaciones del hotel, pero sobre todo por el personal, que está muy atento y tienen la calidez y el sentido de servicio que uno quisiera encontrar en cualquier hotel. Pablo nos dio buena información sobre la zona para nuestros planes y fue siempre muy amable. La comida está muy buena y el chef, igualmente, está dispuesto siempre para brindar un servicio inigualable. Es un lugar al que se quiere volver, por el hotel y sobretodo por el staff.
Al ser un lugar nuevo los mapas de las apps no indican bien la forma de llegar, pero el personal del hotel estuvo muy atento para facilitar la llegada.

Hector et Pablo ainsi que le reste du personnel ont été adorable. L’endroit est magique, c’est magnifique, calme et Pablo était toujours aux petits soins avec nous. Nous avons mangé sur place et le repas était excellent, et nous avons commandé des mojitos qui étaient merveilleux! Cette pause dans notre roadtrip était fabuleuse. Je vous conseille l’endroit à 10000%.
Tout était parfait!

Замечательное тихое место в джунглях, очень заботливый персонал. Великолепная кухня, шеф повар готовит с душой, приходит лично поинтересоваться все ли понравилось. Очень вкусные коктейли. Сравнивая с проживанием на побережье среди людей и дискотек - это оазис, где полное уединение, где можно отдохнуть душой и телом. Самый лучший дикий пляж напротив через дорогу, вход платный 97 MXN, но оно того стоит. До него можно доехать на велосипедах, которые есть в отеле. 
Если у вас есть машина, это идеальное место.
Слабый WI-FI, но это скорее плюс, что бы не отвлекаться от отдыха)
Hôtel à taille humaine , au calme , gentillesse des hôtes

Очень комфортное, уединённое и приватное место, замечательный персонал, Пабло очень внимательный и заботливый управляющий. Удобная кровать с балдахином. Отдельно стоящий  домик. Очень красиво. Отличная кухня, великолепный шеф повар. Бутик отель! Первый день мы провели тут и не выходили наружу, отдыхали от дороги из Лиссабона после 10 часов перелета. Это был замечательный день.

Сложно найти место, не хватает знаков с названием отеля. Изначально приехали в другой отель по навигатору google и нам повезло, что заботливый персонал в 2 часа ночи проводил нас в нужное место. Бесплатный завтрак очень простой. При этом кухня по меню очень вкусная и разнообразная. Поэтому каждое утро приходилось заказывать на завтрак дополнительно омлет и он был очень вкусный, но за деньги. Без машины сюда не добраться, но это не минус, просто надо знать. Или такси, но это достаточно дикое место и все пляжи далеко. С машиной очень комфортно.

Magnifique hôtel récent situé dans la végétation au calme. Très peu de chambres, tout est propre, c'est vraiment un endroit agréable loin du tumulte de Tulum.
Le petit village avant l'hôtel vaut le déplacement. Le soir tous les habitants sortent et c'est sympa.

- da gibt KEINE Klimaanlage. schlafen bei +30 grad ist wirklich eine Herausforderung. es gibt Ventilatoren, die sind aber extrem laut…
- Thema Essen und Restaurant- die Wartezeit für Frühstück liegt bei ca. 60 Minuten- wir waren einzige Kunden zu dem Zeitpunkt. Qualität des Essen ist sehr hoch, aber bei den Wartezeiten, muss ich es hier erwähnen

Hotel jest przepiękny, niezwykle klimatyczny - pokoje to domki kryte strzechą, wszystko bardzo czyste i nowe. Teren hotelu jest ogrodzony, codziennie sprzątany z liści, tak samo jak basen. W nocy pięknie podświetlony - mimo że bylismy jedynymi gośćmi w tym czasie, obsługa przygotowywała cały teren jak dla wielu gosci. Na miejscu są miejsca parkingowe. Polecam wieczorną kąpiel w basenie. Hotel znajduje sie dosc daleko od głównej drogi dlatego nie ma hałasu, slychac dżunglę, ptaki. Obsługa nie mówi po angielsku ale bardzo się stara i jest bardzo sympatyczna.
Sporym mankamentem jest droga dojazdowa, jest bardzo dziurawa. Bez auta ani rusz. Śniadania to tosty i owoce więc nie starczają na długo - śniadanie mogłoby być większe

Everything was perfect at this small boutique hotel with a nice pool. The staff was one of the best I've ever encountered. I loved having the front desk accessible via WhatsApp and I could always order food until 10pm at night. The rooms are spacious and well done. The bed was comfortable. I was able to get a massage on the rooftop which was serene and safe. I highly recommend this place for anyone seeking a calm place in the jungle but also close enough to the beach and Tulum. Price cannot be beat.
Excelente para descansar y relajarse, el staff muy amable y servicial.

Primi welcomed us and ensured our comfort throughout the entire stay.  Even educating us some on the Mexican dishes served as well as the surrounding area.  We would like to thank him again for everything.  Staff in general are incredible.  Exceed all expectations in attention to detail.  Could not ask for a better stay.  The decor is also very cool and the food(breakfast and dinner) absolutely delicious.  An added bonus is that it was also priced much better than surrounding areas both food wise and lodging.

The facilities are beautiful and the staff are beyond helpful and hospital. Very quiet and relaxing weekend. They went above and beyond to ensure my dietary needs were accommodated and I had a beautiful message on the rooftop.

I gave them a 3 because I had the most perfect weekend right up until checkout. They had me standing there for 20 minutes going back and forth about the fact that I paid already on the Friday at checkin and they wanted me to pay again. I ended up paying again, thinking they were refunding me for the last night that I wasn’t staying. Now, I am chasing them for paying double what I should have and they are not responsive.

The place is totally amazing, calm, full of nature and mystic. Besides, the service and workers were super helpful and friendly. Breakfast is yummy but simple, You can choose between 5 options and all include a juice or a coffee. Service is quite good, Daniel gave us a lot of tips for us to walk around the area. They were also kind enough to do laundry for us and the cleaning lady came and explained me the process to ensure no clothes loose their color on the process. 
Our kids loved the small pool, just make sure if you go at night use repellent as the mosquitos go around the pool at that time .
We will come back !
